summary: Input: i8042 - fix leaking of platform device on module removal
details:
Input: i8042 - fix leaking of platform device on module removal

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.267 by commit 81df118e79b2136b5c016394f67a051dc508b7b6, it was introduced in version v4.19.224 by commit 68fdb0499653a2519691e645fcb72944f6e1e220. For more details please see the references link.
